title: ATLAS - REFRESH CHECK AFTER RESTORE
time_sequence: GR - ATLAS PHASE 6.3 - PROCESSING AFTER STAR 2

task_list.instruction_title:
Execute 

SCRIPT :
 [nhev3txb:/home/migsup/tools/Ctrl_refresh.ksh](http://nhev3txb/home/migsup/tools/Ctrl_refresh.ksh) ENVXXXX

In case of difficulty with the script, execute :
1. SQL Query : count (*)  from T_TRA_DET t  where code_chain_0195 = '17' 
count (*)  from T_TRA_DET t  where code_chain_0195 = '32' 
on the 2 servers

2. SQL Query : for check the last date process in T_COMPANY :
Select t.date_process_last_0143 from NHDBO.t_company t Where t.nbr_co_0143 = 001

3. Access control for QSAM fileson the 2 servers 
piquet@[axvgvatxbsit01p:/files/data/P92/](http://axvgvatxbsit01p/files/data/P92/) $ wc -l F92E.QSAM 5260 F92E.QSAM

Execute 

SCRIPT :
 [nhev3txb:/home/migsup/tools/Ctrl_refresh.ksh](http://nhev3txb/home/migsup/tools/Ctrl_refresh.ksh) ENVXXXX

In case of difficulty with the script, execute :

on the 2 servers

2. SQL Query : for check the last date process in T_COMPANY :
Select t.date_process_last_0143 from NHDBO.t_company t Where t.nbr_co_0143 = 001

3. Access control for QSAM fileson the 2 servers
